goals.1: packing all objects into the bin
goals.2: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a fragile object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: avoid handling and moving any box
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when push a object, neither fragile and rigid objects are permitted, but only soft objects are permitted
